body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--006a51241073e994b41acfe9ec718e94-->
### Code Coverage
For detailed information about the code coverage, see the [test coverage report](https://corecheck.dev/bitcoin/bitcoin/pulls/29269).
<!--021abf342d371248e50ceaed478a90ca-->
### Reviews
See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process.
| Type | Reviewers |
| ---- | --------- |
| Concept ACK | [moonsettler](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29269#issuecomment-1900408304) |

If your review is incorrectly listed, please react with ð to this comment and the bot will ignore it on the next update.
<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#29280](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29280) (Implement OP_CHECKTEMPLATEVERIFY by reardencode)
* [#29270](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29270) (Implement OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK(VERIFY) by reardencode)
* [#29265](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29265) (Add `SigVersion` parameter to `IsOpSuccess()` by Christewart)
* [#29247](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29247) (Reenable OP_CAT by 0xBEEFCAF3)
* [#29221](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29221) (Implement 64 bit arithmetic op codes in the Script interpreter by Christewart)
* [#29198](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29198) (OP_CHECKTEMPLATEVERIFY, OP_CHECKSIGFROMSTACK(VERIFY), OP_INTERNALKEY validation (LNHANCE) by reardencode)
* [#29050](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/29050) (Add OP_TXHASH and OP_CHECKTXHASHVERIFY opcodes by stevenroose)
* [#28806](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28806) (rpc: Add script verification flags to getdeploymentinfo by ajtowns)
* [#28550](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/28550) (Covenant tools softfork by jamesob)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
